query:
SELECT
                EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date)::float / 86400 as "date!",
                periods,
                fully_absent,
                comment
            FROM teacher_future_schedules as tfs
            WHERE
                tfs.teacher = $1 AND
                DATE '1/1/1970' + $2 * INTERVAL '1 day' <= tfs.date AND
                tfs.date <= DATE '1/1/1970' + $3 * INTERVAL '1 day';
